description: pen and brown ink on laid paper

value: Chamber of Ancient Painting / contains specimens / of the Ancient[i] old paintings / from the old Greeks before Cimabue to the time of Massaccio, & sculpture of the same / ages particularly of a St. John & David / with the head of Goliah[sic] at his feet statues / in marble the size of nature by Donatello / Chamber of Medals modern & Antique / Chamber of Gems exceedingly numerous / & valuable, amongst others a head of Tiberius / in Turquoise Stone 3 Inches long / A Portico containing many funeral monuments / consisting of[ii] / Etruscan bas re- / leifs in marble, & Terra Cota with in- / scriptions / A Gallery which unites this building to the / Palace Pitti pitti contains Gothic pictures & / Portraits of the Medici family / In the Vestibules are fine antique / bas releifs[sic] on Sarcophagi, one a Bacchana- / -lian subject with. Centaurs / Another
